name: ARConfiguration.WorldAlignment
desc: Options for how ARKit constructs a scene coordinate system based on real-world device motion.

items.name: case gravity
items.desc: The coordinate system's y-axis is parallel to gravity, and its origin is the initial position of the device.

items.name: case gravityAndHeading
items.desc: The coordinate system's y-axis is parallel to gravity, its x- and z-axes are oriented to compass heading, and its origin is the initial position of the device.

items.name: case camera
items.desc: The scene coordinate system is locked to match the orientation of the camera.
